title: Microsoft Teams:  Intelligent camera support on Teams Rooms on Windows
description:
IntelliFrame enables multi-stream video, face
recognition of in-room participants, active speaker recognition, attributed
voice-based transcription, and panoramic video on front-of-room (180-degree
view) and center-of-room (360-degree view) cameras, taking Teams Rooms on
Windows cameras to the next level of intelligence. IntelliFrame is available
only with the Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro license.
